testimonials.name: Endel
testimonials.comment: KAPLAY API is incredibly intuitive and easy to read. I love how it combines simplicity with power, it’s a truly innovative library that brings HTML5 games to life!

testimonials.name: JSLegend
testimonials.comment: KAPLAY has a very intuitive and easy to use API that makes gamedev a breeze compared to other alternatives.

testimonials.name: Isaac Pante
testimonials.comment: KAPLAY is the best framework to teach programming and create fast and furious video games. We already won three awards with it, and counting!

testimonials.name: niceEli
testimonials.comment: KAPLAY is one of the best libraries for TypeScript I’ve tried. It’s a very simple API yet very powerful.

testimonials.name: Amy
testimonials.comment: The development of KAPLAY has allowed me to make Clickery an awesome game.

testimonials.name: Candy&Carmel
testimonials.comment: KAPLAY has amazing and easy to use features for any type of game. It's made making FIGHT fun and interesting.
